page: EE60023: Power System Analysis And Operation

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Power System Load Flow – Sparse Matrix Techniques. AC/DC power flow studies. Optimal power flow analysis. State Estimation - static as well as dynamic. Generation operation-load forecasting, Economic operation, Unit Commitment. Operational security and reliability considerations. Transmission and Distribution operation, deregulation.
